org.mmbase.bridge.forms
Class NodeWrapperForm

java.lang.Object
  org.mmbase.bridge.util.AbstractNode
      org.mmbase.bridge.util.AbstractNodeManager
          org.mmbase.bridge.forms.Form
              org.mmbase.bridge.forms.NodeWrapperForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<org.mmbase.bridge.Node>, org.mmbase.bridge.Node, org.mmbase.bridge.NodeManager
public class NodeWrapperForm
extends Form

You can also only specify the Node implementation in the 'builder' xml, it will then by FormsCloud be wrapped into an instance of this class.

Method Detail

getNode

public org.mmbase.bridge.Node getNode(int number)
Description copied from class: Form
FormsCloud.getNode(int) will call this method for every of its Forms. The first one not returning null will be used. This default implemetnation returns null, you may want to override this.

Overrides:
getNode in class Form
